title: Wow Thanks Riot
body: After playing a game and at the start in the loading screen my game freezes i alt f4 the game out and then try to reload three times before i have to manually shut down the computer and start, i join in to a 100 stacks nasus go 5/4 and win, but i still get an 5 low priority queues yeah. thanks riot cause you make alot of sense.

replies.body:
This occurs when your modem drops the connection Then reconnects 1-3 seconds later but doesn't lose sync with provider

Willing to bet you have a modem that the internet company gave you  **(which is cheap nasty sh#t!)**

Get a decent modem. Will actually increase the quality and consisitancy of your connection

What is this low priority queue thing?

EDIT: NVM, I just read the leaver buster.

The question now, WHEN does it kick in? I have had trolls in more than one game in a row who left and still got in as fast as I did.

I have these issues sometimes as well. There's really not much you can do about it, but next time if you re-log once and it doesn't work, immediately restart the computer. 

Don't waste your time re-logging multiple times, if something doesn't work once why should it work the 2nd and 3rd time?
It's because you disconnected for a long time.
